title: Furious Piers Morgan chucks PEN at co-host as he loses his temper over Arsenal

Good Morning Britain's Sean Fletcher was forced to duck as Piers Morgan launched a pen at his head following a furious rant about Arsenal's dismal performance last night. 
The sports presenter had been needling Gunners fan Piers about Arsenal's 5-1 defeat at the feet of Bayern Munich last night when Piers launched into a rant about the Premiership club's manager, Arsene Wenger. 
"It's utter nonsense. You know why? They'd already been given the penalty, wwhih was a perfectly valid penalty, no-one disputes that, which they scored. That made it 6-2 on aggregate. The sending off [of Laurent Koscielny] had nothing to do with it," he monologued. Piers ranted about Arsenal's performance (Photo: ITV) He became irate at the suggestion his favourite club always flounder at this point in the season (Photo: ITV) 
"Ridiculous. The guy [Wenger] is completely deluded." 
Piers followed that up with: "No Arsenal fan wants to see Wenger go out like this. He's a great man, great manager. But he's had his time." 
But Sean was determined to have the last word, pointing out: "Arsenal do tend to go out at this stage of the season." Sean was determined to have the last word (Photo: ITV) 
"Ahahahaha," said Piers sarcastically, before reaching for his pen. 
As he launched it across the studio, Sean had to duck to avoid it hitting him. 
"He's throwing pens at me," he said, disbelievingly. He had to duck as Piers' pen whistled through the air (Photo: ITV) 
"Get him out of here. Security!" added Piers. 
The irate presenter struggled to control his temper later on in the programme when the sexist MEP Janusz Korwin-Mikke was brought on to defend his comments about women. 
The Polish politician hit headlines this week after telling the European parliament that women weren't deserving of equal pay because they are "weaker, smaller and less intelligent". 
Korwin-Mikke refused to apologise for his outdated views on GMB, prompting Piers to brand him a "horrendous sexiest pig" and "incredibly stupid". Read More
